item.description:
This movie came to the Boston area lickety-split. I found out it was being released state-side just a couple of weeks ago. Delicacy is a French romantic comedy starring Audrey Tautou (of Amelie fame) and Francois Damiens.

*****From the theater website:

In the French romantic comedy Delicacy, Audrey Tautou is Nathalie, a beautiful, happy, and successful Parisian business executive who finds herself suddenly widowed after a three-year marriage to her soul mate. To cope with her loss, she buries herself and her emotions in her work, to the dismay of her friends, family, and co-workers. One day, inexplicably, her zest for life and love is rekindled by a most unlikely source, her seemingly unexceptional, gauche, and average-looking office subordinate, Markus (French comic star Francois Damiens). At first stunned by Nathalie's unexpected attention, Markus comes to gradually believe in her feelings and shifts into romantic high gear. As their relationship goes from awkward to genuinely loving, Nathalie and Markus will have to overcome a host of obstacles, including everyone else's judgmental perceptions as well as their own self-doubts.

*****

I will purchase my ticket at about 6:00 p.m., then wait at the foot of the stairs in the theater lobby. Look for me and my bright red backpack. At about 6:15 p.m., I will move into the theater auditorium (can't miss the previews). You can find me there if you are late. The movie starts at 6:30 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone. Look for the bright red backpack.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event so I know who to look for.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red backpack. See the event description for more details.
